page.title: 11THE PLAYING FIELDS
page.content: { EARLY DAYS ===== ==== We interviewed mr Alan Jacques}the secretary of the{Playing Field committee. The committee started work on the Bridge Field in{1977}when they first bought the{Bridge Field.}Then they worked on the old Playing Field site which was higher up the river bank. When they reformed the committee in 1976,the old playing fields were not very suitable for developing a playing field for{Grindleford.}The old field only had{two}acres in total area where as the Bridge Field is almost{nine acres in total area and offers plenty of facilities for cricket,football and other sports,and that is why they decided to buy the Bridge Field.
